description: [Sliver](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0633) can support C2 communications over DNS.(Citation: Cybersecurity Advisory SVR TTP May 2021)(Citation: Bishop Fox Sliver Framework August 2019)(Citation: GitHub Sliver C2 DNS)
